Documentation

Documentation

Comprehensive documentation for understanding and working with this template.

Getting Started

This template provides a modern, responsive sidebar navigation pattern similar to OpenAI’s interface, built with Astro for optimal performance.

Architecture

  • Astro Framework: Static site generation with selective hydration
  • React Components: Interactive elements like dark mode toggle
  • Tailwind CSS: Utility-first styling with custom design system
  • Content Collections: Structured content management

Key Features

  • Responsive design with mobile-first approach
  • Dark mode support with system preference detection
  • Type-safe navigation and content management
  • SEO-optimized with proper meta tags
  • Performance-optimized with Astro’s island architecture

Development

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Start development server
npm run dev

# Build for production
npm run build

# Preview production build
npm run preview

Customization

The template is designed to be easily customizable:

  1. Navigation: Edit src/content/navigation/main.json
  2. Pages: Add content in src/content/pages/
  3. Styling: Modify tailwind.config.js and src/styles.css
  4. Components: Create reusable components in src/components/
